translations: n.双轮马车车夫，驾双轮战车者；御夫星座

phrs.translation: 战车的御者, 御夫座, 驾驭战车者, 驾驶马车者

sentences.sentence: The Charioteer of York will soothe the people.
sentences.translation: 约克郡的战车御者会安慰人们。

sentences.sentence: The Charioteer of York will soothe the people .
sentences.translation: 约克郡的战车御者会安慰人们。

sentences.sentence: Of these forces which so triumphantly raced our lives along, my brother Jyotirindra was the charioteer.
sentences.translation: 我哥哥乔迪楞德拉驾驭着使我们的生活这样胜利奔腾的力量。
